titleStmt.title: A late letter from Sir Thomas Fairfax's army now in Truro. Relating the severall passages in the treaty, and what is concluded. Communicated to both Houses of Parliament upon Munday 16. March 1645. Die Lunæ 16 March 1645. Ordered by the Lords assembled in Parliament, that this letter be forthwith printed and published. Ioh. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
titleStmt.author: Rushworth, John, 1612?-1690.

titleStmt.title: A late letter from Sir Thomas Fairfax's army now in Truro. Relating the severall passages in the treaty, and what is concluded. Communicated to both Houses of Parliament upon Munday 16. March 1645. Die Lunæ 16 March 1645. Ordered by the Lords assembled in Parliament, that this letter be forthwith printed and published. Ioh. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
titleStmt.author: Rushworth, John, 1612?-1690.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iohn Wright at the Kings Head in the old Bayley.,

notesStmt.note: Signed on page 5: J.R. [i.e. John Rushworth].
Wing has publication year 1645[6]; Thomason catalogue lists under 1646.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
